subject: fix: wrap OneSignal importScripts in try/catch for SW resilience
body:
If OneSignal CDN is blocked (Brave tracker blocking, ad blockers, CDN
down), importScripts() throws and halts the entire SW script â€” no fetch
handler registers, breaking PWA caching and installability. Now degrades
gracefully: PWA features work, only push notifications degrade.

Bump CACHE_VERSION to v8 to pick up the change.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01C2aoWesvTNUkcParTjnLst
title: wrap OneSignal importScripts in try/catch for SW resilience
